ComicInfo.Summary: Endless Winter Chapter 8: Black Adam leads a team of villains to Stagg Industries, where Sebastian Stagg has a block of ice taken from the arctic that contains the frozen bodies of the Frost King's family. When the Frost King arrives to free his family, Black Adam faces off against him.
